title: The perfect chimichurri
ingredients: ['100g flat leaf parsley leaves, chopped', '250ml olive oil', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '1/2 teaspoon Tabasco sauce', '1/4 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice']
